Description.Name: Das
Description.Details: A former Captain-General of the Free-Worlds-League and one of the few non-Mariks to hold the title, Das is rarely spoken about in the league, having resided over its near downfall. After leaving office Das was revealed to be a member of the so called 'New Wolverines', a group no one in the Inner Sphere is sure about. Whatever his origin, Das constantly finds himself blamed for everything that goes wrong around him, somehow including a sphere-wide mech supercharger shortage
